Text: I love you. Also I already donated/ bought some. Donate as well brahs
I just plunked down a sawbuck for Santa Claus and the Ice Cream Bunny. Totally worth it.

I pirate everything else, so I can't really talk too much, but it's really sad seeing the Rifftrax guys exploited. They're really funny, and worth spending a buck or two for real good laughs I think :(
